/circle6 Denial (feelings of ‘it can’t be true’)
/circle6 Guilt regarding possible responsibility
/circle6 Anger (frequently directed towards the health care staff  , but oft  en masking anger

/circle6 Depression and loss of self-esteem, which may be long-lasting
